mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_addr, user_birth, user_img) values(seq_account_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_addr}, #{user_birth}, #{user_img})
mapper.select: select o.*, c.code_detail, d.dlvr_name from tbl_order o inner join tbl_code c on o.order_state = c.code_no left outer join tbl_deliver d on o.dlvr_no = d.dlvr_no where o.user_no = #{user_no} order by o.order_date desc
